trending.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
trending.description: Summers span decades. Winters can last a lifetime. Whilst kingdoms fight each other for the control of Westeros, a sinister force lurks beyond the Wall.

comingSoon.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
comingSoon.description: Thor embarks on a journey unlike anything he's ever faced a quest for inner peace. However, his retirement gets interrupted by Gorr the God Butcher.
